answers.answer: His weight is just above the 75th percentile and his height is below the 5th percentile for his age. His weight is within normal range, however, his stature is small. Are there small males in your family? He may grow to normal height when he hits puberty (about 2 years away). For his age, he needs daily approximately 2000-2200 calories a day as recommended the following; Fruits = 2 cups; Vegetables 2.5 cups; Grains (cereals, breads) = 6oz equivalents; Meat & beans = 5.5oz equivalents; Dairy products (milk, yogurt) = 3 cups; Oils = 6 tsp; Additional calories to be used discretionary = 267-300. This food needs to be divided up between 3 meals and snacks between meals daily. Hoped this helped you.
